amendment.description: Amendment to the Canady substitute amendment (A001) increases the threshold for payment of compensation from a 10 percent to a 20 percent loss in property value.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to raise the minimum threshold for payment of compensation from a 10% loss to a 20% loss in property value.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Goss to the Canady amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 83 (Roll no. 195).
